channel.title: Bountiful Money
channel.description: Save money, budget according to your values, and experience financial bliss

item.title: Is Financial Independence Is Your Goal?
item.description: Financial Independence. Retire Early. If you’ve spent any time researching personal finance, you may have come across these terms, or the combined term - FIRE. When you first see them, they may seem far-fetched, or even completely unachievable. But today is Independence Day here in the United States, so let’s take a closer look and see how Financial Independence might fit into our lives and our goals.
item.media:title: Sparkler.jpg
